description: [![Open in Visual Studio Code](https://classroom.github.com/assets/open-in-vscode-718a45dd9cf7e7f842a935f5ebbe5719a5e09af4491e668f4dbf3b35d5cca122.svg)](https://classroom.github.com/online_ide?assignment_repo_id=12930617&assignment_repo_type=AssignmentRepo) # Weather App Build a webpage that would ask a user to enter a city name and to output the weather temperature, description, and in image showing the current conditions using the `openweathermap.org api`.
